reviewText: This is a set of seven case studies is the use of agents, data mining, rule-based systems and speech recognition in the .NET framework.  The examples are fairly high level, and these technologies are cutting edge. So you have to look at this as more of a field guide to an adventure rather than a succinct work on stable technologies.
title: Building Intelligent .NET Applications: Agents, Data Mining, Rule-Based Systems, and Speech Processing
